original_text: For this very reason, Christ died and returned to life so that he might be the Lord of both the dead and the living.
korean_text: 이를 위하여 그리스도께서 죽었다가 다시 살아나셨으니 곧 죽은 자와 산 자의 주가 되려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: Christ died and returned to life
so that he might be the Lord
of both the dead and the living
